name: Timachine
description:
A game developed by Shashank.S and Sassy.

All the scripts were written by Shashank.S.

All the models were designed by Sassy.

A game idea by Sassy.

In this game you have invented a Time Machine ,now it switches to past ,future and present without your control by pausing the movements of objects and animals.

Just avoid obstacles and animals which comes in your way and survive...

PC   CONTROLS ==================
A = Steer right
D = Steer left
{Hold} P = Earn points
